column1: Table 4: Long-term international immigration, emigration and net migration of non-EU+ nationals by reason,
using new approach to producing migration estimates [definition 4] [notes 7, 8]
Notes and definitions are referred to in this table. The text for these can be found in the corresponding worksheets.
Some shorthand is used in this table, P = provisional, R = revised, YE = Year Ending, BNO = British National (Overseas)
